ygData.subject: What about the Drum graphic?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, Long time lurker here. I haven t played in a while, but was wondering if anyone had heard whether or not the overhaul being done to the character
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

Long time lurker here. I haven't played in a while, but was wondering if
anyone had heard whether or not the overhaul being done to the character
models will include an actual drum graphic for bards? Last I recall, quite
some time ago, when asked whether or not they'd be correcting it, they said
they couldn't because it was too involved to address at the time.

However, since they're re-doing the models for Luclin, I wonder if it
wouldn't be the perfect opportunity to fix this animation? Just wondering
if anyone knew of their intentions?

If any of you all get Luclin up and running tomorrow and find out, if you
could post to the list that would be great.. I doubt my copy of Luclin will
come in for a couple days yet. Thanks!

Konus
51 Songs on the Rathe
